channel.title: Updating
channel.description:
Trying to update a frame.. While being logged in.
The frame is there, it updates when i equip an item, but not automatically, it requires a logout....
Can someone help me so it does it automatically once you equip the item?

item.title: Updating
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

Under the

update(); sendFrame126("@whi@Bank", 180);//frist emote slot sendFrame126("@whi@train); sendFrame126("@whi@ ", 178); sendFrame126("@whi@ ",175); sendFrame126("@whi@ ",177); sendFrame126("@whi@ ",182); }

I tried to do something like this

update(); sendFrame126("@whi@Bank", 180);//frist emote slot sendFrame126("@whi@Dummy",181); if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 == true); { updateRequired == true; sendFrame126("@whi@Whip", 178); } else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 == false); { updateRequired == true; sendFrame126(@whi@Weap", 178); } }

Once i get this done i can post my New Tut…
But it won’t update unless you log out then back in… it changes then

Read full topic

give me more detail with the scenario and ill be able to help
